definitions.la4: to leave out; to be missing; to leave behind or forget to bring; to lag or fall behind;
definitions.lao4: see 落枕[lao4 zhen3] and 落炕[lao4 kang4];
definitions.luo4: to fall or drop; (of the sun) to set; (of a tide) to go out; to lower; to decline or sink; to lag or fall behind; to fall onto; to rest with; to get or receive; to write down; whereabouts; settlement;
